title: About
text:
Have a strong interest in business and industry analysis also have a passion for strategy. My area of focus and interest varies from quantitative analysis to project management. Generated innovative ideas and strategic to improve processes has provided me with a deeper understanding of multifaceted problems that companies encounter in their daily operations. Used my analytical aptitude and creative problem solving skills to their fullest through strategical thinking.
